page.title: 07E.ALLINGTON HALL(CONT)
page.content: Parish Council hold meetings every two months representing the population of the Parish.Women's Institute have 30 members and meet every third Monday of the month.Mother and Toddlers meet on Tuesdays 2_4pm This is for Mothers with children under 5yrs. The cost is 20p.per child.The mothers meet and enjoy tea and biscuits while the children play with a variety of toys.Play Group(for children 3-5yrs)meet on Monday and Thursday 9.30-noon. There are 18 children on the register,a paid supervisor and two mother helpers on a rota. Apples and milk are provided. The cost is 70p per child per session.
